_header: The King of heaven with us be
_description: A Prologue, possibly for an Easter Sermon — fifteen lines in 6-line stanzas

OxfUni142.First Lines:
Te kyng of heuen with ous bepes loue and
                    charyte…
OxfUni142.Last Lines:
…and þoled deþe for oueroode [?]and for man ys
                    sake…
OxfUni142.Note:
Added to original flyleaf at end, hand of s. xv; ending
                    incomplete.
